abstract: Turkish Pres Recep Tayyip Erdogan has begun exploiting failed military coup to shape narrative of heroism and to supplant Mustafa Kemal Ataturk, founder of modern Turkey, as country's most consequential figure; Erdogan has cast event as victory of Islam over traitorous element, in bid to replace Ataturk's secular state with Islamic one.

keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: President Recep Tayyip Erdogan is racing to banish the legacy of Mustafa Kemal Ataturk and establish himself and Islam as the most consequential factors in modern Turkish history.
snippet: President Recep Tayyip Erdogan is racing to banish the legacy of Mustafa Kemal Ataturk and establish himself and Islam as the most consequential factors in modern Turkish history....

headline.main: Erdogan Seizes Failed Coup in Turkey as a Chance to Supplant Ataturk
headline.print_headline: Erdogan Turning Coup on Its Head to Supplant Ataturk
